pages-modal-create_intro-title: Hi %s, awesome you're starting a part-up!
pages-modal-create_intro-paragraph: Part-up is all about teamwork, and you are the one to kick it off! Other uppers can join your part-up once you have shared your goals and first thoughts on the activities. Together you make it work.
pages-modal-create_intro-explanation: Click the button 'Start a part-up' to get started.
pages-modal-create_intro-start-explanati: Provide a name, goal and short description for your part-up. Determine where the part-up takes place and when it ends.
pages-modal-create_intro-activities-expl: Add activities to your part-up and define what needs to be done to be succesful
pages-modal-create_intro-promote-explana: You are now ready to get your team together! Share your part-up with your network or social media.
